TITLE: Named Selection Source Filtering
DESCRIPTION: Validates new named-selection source modes and refresh behavior after both RST files are loaded
INPUTS: Application launched; Analysis 1 and Analysis 2 RST files with named selections
TEST STEPS: 1. Load Analysis 1 and Analysis 2 RST files; 2. Select Common mode and inspect list; 3. Select Analysis 1 mode and inspect list; 4. Select Analysis 2 mode and inspect list; 5. Click Refresh and verify list consistency
EXPECTED RESULTS: Named Selection Source becomes enabled; Common mode lists only intersection names; Analysis 1 and Analysis 2 modes list corresponding names; Refresh keeps list aligned with active mode

TITLE: Named Selection Scoping Precedence
DESCRIPTION: Validates same-name scoping precedence and Analysis-2-only selection behavior
INPUTS: Both RST files loaded; One same-name NS with different node sets; One Analysis-2-only NS
TEST STEPS: 1. Select same-name NS and run solve; 2. Verify scoping source behavior; 3. Switch to Analysis 2 source mode; 4. Select Analysis-2-only NS and run solve
EXPECTED RESULTS: Common-name NS uses Analysis 1 node content for scoping; Analysis-2-only NS is accepted and solve proceeds

TITLE: Named Selection Dropdown Readability
DESCRIPTION: Validates widened dropdown field and popup for long named selection names
INPUTS: Both RST files loaded with long NS names
TEST STEPS: 1. Open named selection dropdown; 2. Inspect popup list item visibility; 3. Select long-name entry and inspect field text
EXPECTED RESULTS: Long names are readable in popup and selected field with minimal truncation

TITLE: Solver Tooltip Coverage and Content
DESCRIPTION: Validates newly added/updated Solver tab tooltips including Import CSV and Output Options rules
TEST STEPS: 1. Hover Base Analysis and Analysis 2 buttons; 2. Hover Named Selection Source and Named Selection controls; 3. Hover Import CSV button and Output Options group; 4. Hover Add Row/Delete Row
EXPECTED RESULTS: Tooltips display expected guidance content; Import CSV tooltip shows expected header/prefix format; Output Options tooltip states exclusivity rules

TITLE: Display Tooltip Coverage and CSV Guidance
DESCRIPTION: Validates Display tab tooltip additions especially visualization file format guidance
TEST STEPS: 1. Hover Load Visualization File button; 2. Verify required columns and example header text; 3. Hover other key visualization/export controls
EXPECTED RESULTS: Tooltip includes required X Y Z columns optional NodeID and example header; Display controls show contextual guidance

TITLE: Global Tooltip Setting and Persistence
DESCRIPTION: Validates View-menu toggle for tooltip on/off behavior and persistent state
INPUTS: Application launched with tooltips enabled by default
TEST STEPS: 1. Open View menu and uncheck Enable Tooltips; 2. Hover controls in Solver and Display tabs; 3. Re-enable and verify tooltips appear; 4. Restart app and verify saved state
EXPECTED RESULTS: Tooltip popups are globally suppressed when disabled; tooltips reappear when enabled; setting persists across restart via QSettings

TITLE: Tooltip Style Consistency with MARS_
DESCRIPTION: Validates tooltip color/font/border styling consistency against sibling MARS_ project
INPUTS: Application launched; reference MARS_ styling available
TEST STEPS: 1. Hover tooltips in MARS-SC; 2. Compare visual style attributes with MARS_ tooltip style definition
EXPECTED RESULTS: Tooltip style matches MARS_ palette and typography settings
